name: webrtc-stats-gatherer
description: Gathers stats on interval for webrtc peer connection

scripts.compile: node_modules/.bin/browserify src/StatsGatherer.js -s StatsGatherer -o out/stats-gatherer.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.test: npm run compile && node_modules/.bin/semistandard && node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/test.js

author: Fippo Hancke, Lance Stout, Xander Dumaine
